monster.name: Animated Broom
senses: visió a cegues 120 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: False Object
entries: If the broom is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the broom move or act, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Saviesa (Percepció) check to discern that the broom is animate.

trait.name: Passar Volant
entries: The broom no provoca atacs d'oportunitats quan surt volant de l'abast d'un enemic

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The broom fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Broomstick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany contundent.

monster.name: Animated Chained Library
senses: visió a cegues 30 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: False Object
entries: If the library is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the library move or act, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Saviesa (Percepció) check to discern that the library is animate.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The library fa dos atacs.

action.name: Chained Book
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany contundent, and if the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}).

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Quill casts one of the following spells using Carisma as the spellcasting ability (save {@dc 17}):

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Quill fa dos atacs with his dagger and uses Supreme Mockery.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Quill's Fable {@recharge}
entries: Quill utters a short fable while targeting up to five creatures within 30 feet of him that he can see. Each target that can hear Quill's magical fable ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 17}. Qui falli rep 36 ({@damage 8d8}) de dany psíquic; si supera, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Supreme Mockery
entries: Quill hurls a string of insults laced with enchantments at a creature he can see within 60 feet of him. If the creature can hear Quill (though it need not understand him), ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 17} or take 66 ({@damage 12d10}) de dany psíquic and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (2/Dia)
entries: Si Bak Mei falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Bak Mei carries a staff of striking with 10 charges.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While Bak Mei is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, his AC includes his Saviesa modifier.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Bak Mei attacks three times: twice with Thunder Strike and once with his staff of striking.

action.name: Thunder Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) de dany de tro, and if the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 17} or be {@condition deafened} and {@condition stunned} until the start of Bak Mei's next turn.

action.name: Staff of Striking
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent, o 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dos mans, and Bak Mei can expend up to 3 of the staff's charges. For each expended charge, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d6} de dany de força.

action.name: Auto Curació (es Recarrega amb un Descans Llarg)
entries: Bak Mei regains {@dice 2d8 + 4} hit points, and all levels of {@condition exhaustion} end on him.

bonus.name: Fugida Veloç
entries: Bak Mei takes the Disengage or Hide action.

reaction.name: Deflect Missile
entries: In response to being hit by a ranged weapon attack, Bak Mei deflects the missile. The damage he takes from the attack is reduced by {@dice 1d10 + 12}. If the damage is reduced to 0, Bak Mei catches the missile if it's small enough to hold in one hand and Bak Mei has a hand free.

legendary.name: Crane Dance
entries: Bak Mei moves up to 20 feet. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Thunder Strike (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Bak Mei uses Thunder Strike.

trait.name: Limited Spell Immunity
entries: The golem automatically succeeds on saving throws against spells of 7th level or lower, and the attack rolls of such spells always miss it.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The golem doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The golem fa dos atacs.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) de dany de força.

action.name: Crystal Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany de força.

reaction.name: Spell Deflection
entries: In response to a spell attack missing the golem, it causes that spell a impactar another creature within 120 feet of it that it can see.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The ghost casts one of the following spells, using Carisma as the spellcasting ability and requiring no material components:

trait.name: Visió Etèrea
entries: The ghost pot veure el Pla Etèri fins a 120 peus d'abast quan està al Pla Material (i viceversa).

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The ghost pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. Rep 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força si acaba el seu torn dins d'un objecte.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The ghost recupera 10 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn. If the ghost takes radiant damage or damage from a magic weapon, this trait doesn't function at the start of the ghost's next turn. The ghost dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The ghost fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Spectral Weapon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) de dany de força.

action.name: Eterietat
entries: The ghost entra el Pla Etèri des del Pla Material (i viceversa). És visible des del Pla Material quan està al Llindar Eteri (i viceversa). Tanmateix no pot afectar ni ésser afectat per res de l'altre pla.

action.name: Wind Howl {@recharge}
entries: The ghost emits a dreadful howl that summons a cold, biting wind. This wind engulfs up to three creatures of the ghost's choice that it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target is pulled up to 20 feet toward the ghost and ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany de fred; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The commoner doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep, and it gains no benefit from finishing a short or long rest. When it drops to 0 hit points, it becomes a lifeless object.

action.name: Garrot
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The avatar fa dos atacs: one with its hooves and one with its horn.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}32 ({@damage 8d6 + 4}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Horn
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}32 ({@damage 8d6 + 4}) de dany necròtic. If the target is a humanoid, ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 13} or be transformed into a wolf under the avatar's control. This transformation lasts for 1 hour, or until the target drops to 0 hit points or dies. The target's game statistics are replaced by the wolf's statistics, but it retains its hit points. The target is limited in the actions it can perform by the nature of its wolf form, and it can't speak, cast spells, or take any other action that requires hands or speech. The target's gear melds into the new form, and it can't activate, use, wield, or otherwise benefit from any of its equipment.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The dragon tortoise fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws. It can make one atac de cua in place of its two claw attacks.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 20} or be pushed up to 10 feet away from the dragon tortoise and knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Alè de Steam {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon tortoise exhales abrasive sand en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18}. Qui falli rep 52 ({@damage 15d6}) de dany tallant; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: Faerl té avantatge a salvar contra la condició {@condition charmed} i no pot patir son màgicament

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: Faerl adds 2 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, he must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monster.name: Fungal Servant
languages: The languages it knew in life

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The fungal servant és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 10. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Saviesa ({@dc 17} salvada de conjur, {@hit 9} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The fungal servant has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The fungal servant té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: A destroyed fungal servant gains a new body in 24 hours if its heart is intact, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the fungal servant's heart.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The fungal servant can use its Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with its rotting fist.

action.name: Rotting Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) de dany contundent mes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany necròtic. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16} or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 ({@dice 3d6}) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to spores. The curse lasts until removed by the remove curse spell or other magic.

action.name: Dreadful Glare
entries: The fungal servant targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the fungal servant, ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 16} against this magic or become {@condition frightened} until the end of the fungal servant's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition paralyzed} for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all fungal servants for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The fungal servant makes one attack with its rotting fist or uses its Dreadful Glare.

legendary.name: Blinding Spores
entries: Blinding spores swirls magically around the fungal servant. Each creature within 5 feet of the fungal servant ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16} or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the creature's next turn.

legendary.name: Blasphemous Word (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The fungal servant utters a blasphemous word. Each non-undead creature within 10 feet of the fungal servant that can hear the magical utterance ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16} or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the fungal servant's next turn.

legendary.name: Channel Negative Energy (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The fungal servant magically unleashes negative energy. Creatures within 60 feet of the fungal servant, including ones behind barriers and around corners, can't regain hit points until the end of the fungal servant's next turn.

legendary.name: Whirlwind of Spores (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The fungal servant magically transforms into a whirlwind of spores, moves up to 60 feet, and reverts to its normal form. While in whirlwind form, the fungal servant is immune to all damage, and it can't be {@condition grappled}, {@condition petrified}, knocked {@condition prone}, {@condition restrained}, or {@condition stunned}. Equipment worn or carried by the fungal servant remain in its possession.

monster.name: Gingwatzim
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Alternate Forms
entries: The gingwatzim has two alternate forms, both of which are chosen by its creator when the gingwatzim comes into being. One form is an exact duplicate of a Tiny nonmagical object (such as a book, dagger, or gemstone) that its creator is carrying or wearing when the gingwatzim is conjured. The other form can be any Tiny beast. Once these alternate forms are chosen, they can't be changed.

action.name: Energy Drain (True Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}16 ({@damage 4d6 + 2}) de dany necròtic, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 12} o gain 1 level of {@condition exhaustion}. When the target finishes a short or long rest, the target loses every level of {@condition exhaustion} gained from this attack.

action.name: Canviar de Forma
entries: The gingwatzim changes from its true form—a 3-foot-diameter sphere of luminous ectoplasm—into one of its two alternate forms, or from one of those forms back into its true form. In object form, it can't move or make attacks but otherwise retains its statistics, and it is indistinguishable from the thing it is imitating. In beast form, it retains its hit points but otherwise uses the stat block of the beast it is imitating. When it dies, the gingwatzim reverts to its true form and then vanishes.

monster.name: Grippli Warrior
languages: Grippli plus one other language (usually Common, Draconic, or Primordial)

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The grippli pot aguantar la respiració durant 20 minuts.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The grippli can leap 30 feet horizontally or 20 feet vertically from a standing position.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The grippli makes one attack with its tongue. If this attack hits, the grippli can make a melee attack using its trident against the same target.

action.name: Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the grippli can't grab another creature.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant, o 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany perforant if the grippli had advantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Arc curt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant, mes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany perforant if the grippli had advantage on the attack roll.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The hag's és Saviesa ({@dc 12} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

spellcasting.name: Shared Spellcasting
headerEntries: While all three members of the Fetid Gaze are within 30 feet of one another, they can each cast the following spells from the wizard's spell list but must share the spell slots among themselves:
footerEntries: For casting these spells, each hag is a 12th-level spellcaster that uses Intel·ligència as her spellcasting ability. The spell save DC is 12 + the hag's Intel·ligència modifier, and the spell attack bonus is 4 + the hag's Intel·ligència modifier.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The hag pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The hag can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 14} Saviesa (Insight) check.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Illusory Appearance
entries: The hag covers herself and anything she is wearing or carrying with a magical illusion that makes her look like another creature of her general size and humanoid shape. The illusion ends if the hag takes a bonus action to end it or if she dies.

The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, the hag could appear to have smooth skin, but someone touching her would feel her rough flesh. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a {@dc 20} Intel·ligència (Investigation) check to discern that the hag is disguised.

action.name: Invisible Passage
entries: The hag magically turns {@condition invisible} until she attacks or casts a spell, or until her concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). While {@condition invisible}, she leaves no physical evidence of her passage, so she can be tracked only by magic. Any equipment she wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with her.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the monk is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Saviesa modifier.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The monk fa dos atacs.

action.name: Force Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany de força, and if the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 14} or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While Jade Tigress is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her AC includes her Saviesa modifier.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Jade Tigress fa tres atacs.

action.name: Force Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany de força, and if the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15} or be {@condition stunned} until the of Jade Tigress's next turn.

action.name: Poisoned Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant mes 7 ({@damage 3d4}) de dany de verí, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 15} o gain 1 level of {@condition exhaustion}.

action.name: Auto Curació (es Recarrega amb un Descans Llarg)
entries: Jade Tigress regains {@dice 2d8 + 2} hit points, and all levels of {@condition exhaustion} end on her.

bonus.name: Fugida Veloç
entries: Jade Tigress takes the Disengage or Hide action.

reaction.name: Deflect Missile
entries: In response to being hit by a ranged weapon attack, Jade Tigress deflects the missile. The damage she takes from the attack is reduced by {@dice 1d10 + 9}. If the damage is reduced to 0, Jade Tigress catches the missile if it's small enough to hold in one hand and Jade Tigress has a hand free.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: K'Tulah is a 4th-level spellcaster. K'Tulah's spellcasting ability is Saviesa ({@dc 12} salvada de conjur, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). K'Tulah has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Feline Agility
entries: When K'Tulah moves on her turn in combat, she can double her speed until the end of the turn. Once she uses this ability, K'Tulah can't use it again until she moves 0 feet on one of her turns.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar ({@hit 4} a impactar amb shillelagh), 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent, 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany contundent if wielded with two hands, o 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany contundent amb shillelagh.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The kiddywidget doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The kiddywidget fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} by the kiddywidget (escape {@dc 8}).

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant mes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany elèctric.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The lich casts one of the following spells using Saviesa as the spellcasting ability (save {@dc 19}):

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the lich falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If it has a phylactery, a destroyed lich gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The lich fa quatre atacs.

action.name: Poisonous Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}17 ({@damage 5d6}) de dany de verí, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 19} o be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Wither
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 9} a impactar, 60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Fire Storm (Conjur de Nivell 7; 1/Dia)
entries: The lich fills up to ten 10-foot cubes with fire. Every cube must be within 150 feet of the lich and occupy a space the lich can see, and each cube must have at least one face adjacent to the face of another cube. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 19}. Qui falli rep 38 ({@damage 7d10}) de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat. The fire ignites flammable objects in the area que ningú estigui portant o vestint. If the lich chooses, plant life in the area is unaffected by the spell.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The lich makes an attack.

legendary.name: Poison Prick (Cost 2 Actions)
entries: The lich targets one {@condition poisoned} creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 19} or fall {@condition unconscious} until the {@condition poisoned} condition ends on it.

legendary.name: Sap Life (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The lich targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 19} or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany necròtic. The lich regains a number of hit points equal to the amount of damage that the creature takes.

monster.name: Lightning Golem

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics que no siguin d'adamantí

languages: comprèn els idiomes dels seus creadors però no pot parlar

trait.name: Berserk
entries: Whenever the golem starts its turn with 40 hit points or fewer, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points.

The golem's creator, if within 60 feet of the berserk golem, can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively. The golem must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make a {@dc 15} Carisma (Persuasion) check. If the check succeeds, the golem ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 40 hit points or fewer, the golem might go berserk again.

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Lightning Absorption
entries: Whenever the golem is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The golem té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The golem's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The golem makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany elèctric.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The sage casts one of the following spells, using Intel·ligència as the spellcasting ability (save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics):

action.name: Shocking Grasp (Truc)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 8} a impactar (with advantage if the target is wearing armor made of metal), 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany elèctric, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Fireball (Conjur de Nivell 3; 3/Dia)
entries: The sage creates a fiery explosion centered on a point it can see within 150 feet of it. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 14}. Qui falli rep 28 ({@damage 8d6}) de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat. The fire spreads around corners and ignites flammable objects in the area que ningú estigui portant o vestint.

reaction.name: Shield (Conjur de Nivell 1; 3/Dia)
entries: When the sage is hit by an attack or targeted by a magic missile spell, it calls forth an invisible barrier of magical force that protects it. Until the start of its next turn, the sage has a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and it takes no damage from magic missile.

monster.name: Miirym
senses: visió fosca 120 peus; see also "x-ray vision" below

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Miirym casts one of the following spells, using Carisma as the spellcasting ability (save {@dc 21}) and requiring no material components:

trait.name: Bound to Candlekeep
entries: Miirym can't leave Candlekeep and is immune to any effect that would place her in a location outside it, including an extradimensional space. If she dies, Miirym regains her form and all her hit points after {@dice 1d10} days, reappearing in the location where she died or in the nearest unoccupied space.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: Miirym recupera 40 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn. If Miirym takes damage from a magic weapon or a spell, this trait doesn't function at the start of Miirym's next turn. Miirym dies only if she starts her turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: Miirym pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. She takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força if she ends her turn inside an object.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Miirym falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: X-Ray Vision
entries: Miirym can see through solid matter out to a range of 60 feet. To her, opaque creatures, objects, and obstacles within that distance appear transparent and don't prevent light from passing through them. This vision can penetrate 5 feet of stone, 3 inches of common metal, and up to 10 feet of wood or dirt. Thicker substances block this vision, as does a thin sheet of lead.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}34 ({@damage 9d6 + 3}) de dany de força.

action.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge 5}
entries: Miirym uses one of the following breath weapons:

action.name: Cold Breath
entries: Miirym exhales an icy blast en un con de 90 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 21}. Qui falli rep 67 ({@damage 15d8}) de dany de fred; si supera, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Necrotic Breath
entries: Miirym exhala un bolt of necrotic energy en una línia de 120 peus de llarg i 10 d'ample. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 21}. Qui falli rep 82 ({@damage 15d10}) de dany necròtic; si supera, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Paralyzing Breath
entries: Miirym exhales paralyzing gas en un con de 90 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 21} or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Presència Aterradora
entries: Each creature of Miirym's choice that is within 120 feet of her and aware of her ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 21} or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Miirym's Presència Aterradora for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Mossegada
entries: Miirym makes a bite attack.

legendary.name: Teleportar (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Miirym magically teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space she can see.

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

trait.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
entries: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic is also {@condition grappled} by it (escape {@dc 10}). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

trait.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
entries: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

trait.name: Grappler
entries: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature {@condition grappled} by it.

action.name: Pseudòpode
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany contundent. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany d'àcid.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Nintra casts one of the following spells, using Carisma as the spellcasting ability (save {@dc 20}) and requiring no material components:

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Nintra falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Nintra fa dos atacs.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d4 + 7}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Shard of Shadow
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 12} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d6 + 7}) de dany necròtic, and if the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 20} or be {@condition poisoned} fins el final del seu proper torn.

action.name: Storm of Shattered Glass {@recharge}
entries: Nintra targets a point she can see within 60 feet of her and creates a 20-foot-radius sphere of swirling glass shards centered on that point. Each creature in the sphere ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 20}, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) de dany tallant on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful save. If Nintra is in the sphere, the shards deal no damage to her.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Nintra makes one attack.

legendary.name: Fey Step
entries: Nintra teleports to an unoccupied space she can see within 30 feet of her.

legendary.name: Shadow Strikes (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Provided she is in bright or dim light, Nintra causes her shadow to attack a creature within 10 feet of her. Her shadow makes two claw attacks, each attack identical to Nintra's claw attack except that it deals psychic damage instead of piercing damage.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The behir fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one to constrict.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Constrènyer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one Large or smaller creature. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) de dany contundent mes 17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) de dany tallant. The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}) if the behir isn't already constricting a creature, and the target is {@condition restrained} until this grapple ends.

action.name: Alè de Llamp {@recharge 5}
entries: The behir exhales a line of lightning that is 20 feet long and 5 feet wide. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 16}. Qui falli rep 66 ({@damage 12d10}) de dany elèctric; si supera, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Empassar
entries: The behir makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the behir, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the behir's turns. A behir can have only one creature swallowed at a time.

Any creature swallowed by a parasite-infested behir ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 19} at the start of each of the behir's turns or be feasted upon by blood parasites, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) de dany necròtic on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful save. This damage is in addition to the damage caused by the behir's digestive acids.

If the behir takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the behir ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14} at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the behir. If the behir dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Ram Sugar és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 4. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Ram Sugar has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Dark Devotion
entries: Ram Sugar has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Ram Sugar fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Breath Weapon (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Ram Sugar exhales fire in a 30-foot-long line that is 5 feet wide. Any creature in the line ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 11}. Qui falli rep 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc; si supera, en rep la meitat.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The sage casts one of the following spells, using Intel·ligència as the spellcasting ability (save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics):

action.name: Shocking Grasp (Truc)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} a impactar (with advantage if the target is wearing armor made of metal), 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany elèctric, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

reaction.name: Shield (Conjur de Nivell 1; 3/Dia)
entries: When the sage is hit by an attack or targeted by a magic missile spell, it calls forth an {@condition invisible} barrier of magical force that protects it. Until the start of its next turn, the sage has a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and it takes no damage from magic missile.

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics que no siguin d'adamantí

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The golem té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The golem's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The golem makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Slow {@recharge 5}
entries: The golem targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 17} against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Sapphire
entries: The sapphire has 3 charges. As an action, the golem can expend 1 charge to cast dispel magic (as a 9th-level spell) from the sapphire using Constitució as its spellcasting ability. The sapphire ceases to glow if all its charges are expended, but it regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn and glows again once it has 1 or more charges.

trait.name: Crushing End
entries: If damage reduces Shemshime to 0 hit points, Shemshime instead drops to 1 hit point unless the damage is the result of Shemshime being crushed by an object weighing at least 1,000 pounds.

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: Shemshime pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. Rep 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força si acaba el seu torn dins d'un objecte.

action.name: Maddening Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) de dany psíquic.

action.name: Whispers of Violence
entries: Shemshime chooses up to two creatures it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 13}, or that target takes 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany psíquic and must use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack against one creature it can abast (Shemshime's choice) that Shemshime can see.

action.name: Howling Babble {@recharge}
entries: Shemshime targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. La criatura ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 13}. On a failed save, it takes 21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) de dany psíquic and is {@condition stunned} fins el final del seu proper torn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

trait.name: Lightning Absorption
entries: Whenever the skitterwidget is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The skitterwidget doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The skitterwidget fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} by the skitterwidget (escape {@dc 13}).

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany elèctric, and if the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15} or be {@condition stunned} fins el final del seu proper torn.

reaction.name: Good Parent
entries: The skitterwidget imposes disadvantage on one attack roll made against a kiddywidget it can see within 5 feet of it.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While Steel Crane is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, his AC includes his Saviesa modifier.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Steel Crane fa tres atacs.

action.name: Force Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany de força, and if the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15} or be {@condition stunned} until the start of Steel Crane's next turn.

action.name: Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) de dany tallant or, if the target is a creature, Steel Crane can grapple the target instead (escape {@dc 15}). Steel Crane can't make attacks with the whip while using it to grapple a creature. Anytime on his turn, he can release a creature {@condition grappled} by the whip (no action required).

action.name: Auto Curació (es Recarrega amb un Descans Llarg)
entries: Steel Crane regains {@dice 2d8 + 4} hit points, and all levels of {@condition exhaustion} end on him.

reaction.name: Deflect Missile
entries: In response to being hit by a ranged weapon attack, Steel Crane deflects the missile. The damage he takes from the attack is reduced by {@dice 1d10 + 10}. If the damage is reduced to 0, Steel Crane catches the missile if it's small enough to hold in one hand and Steel Crane has a hand free.

reaction.name: Slow Descent (3/Dia)
entries: When Steel Crane falls, he can slow his descent, taking no damage from the fall.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant fa dos atacs with its greatsword or hurls two rocks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}30 ({@damage 6d6 + 9}) de dany tallant mes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 14} a impactar, abast 60/240 ft., un objectiu. {@h}35 ({@damage 4d12 + 9}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Llança de Llamp {@recharge 5}
entries: The giant hurls a magical lightning bolt at a point it can see within 500 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 54 ({@damage 12d8}) de dany elèctric; si supera, en rep la meitat.

monster.name: Swarm of Animated Books
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: False Objects
entries: If the swarm is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the swarm move or act, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Saviesa (Percepció) check to discern that the swarm is animate.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a 1-foot-tall, 8-inch-wide, 2-inch-thick object. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Book Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, un objectiu in the swarm's space. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) de dany contundent, o 3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany contundent if the swarm has half its hit points or fewer.

monster.name: Valin Sarnaster
languages: The languages it knew in life

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Valin Sarnaster és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 10. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Saviesa ({@dc 17} salvada de conjur, {@hit 9} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de clergue preparats:

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Valin té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: While her heart remains in Alessia's body, Valin re-forms inside her sarcophagus, regaining all her hit points and becoming active again.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Valin can use her Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with her rotting fist.

action.name: Rotting Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) de dany contundent mes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany necròtic. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16} or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 ({@dice 3d6}) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the remove curse spell or other magic.

action.name: Dreadful Glare
entries: Valin targets one creature she can see within 60 feet of her. If the target can see Valin, ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 16} against this magic or become {@condition frightened} until the end of Valin's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition paralyzed} for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies and senyors de les mòmies for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Valin makes one attack with her rotting fist or uses her Dreadful Glare.

legendary.name: Blinding Dust
entries: Blinding dust and sand swirls magically around Valin. Each creature within 5 feet of Valin ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16} or be {@condition blinded} until the end of her next turn.

legendary.name: Blasphemous Word (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Valin utters a blasphemous word. Each non-undead creature within 10 feet of Valin that can hear the magical utterance ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16} or be {@condition stunned} until the end of Valin's next turn.

legendary.name: Channel Negative Energy (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Valin magically unleashes negative energy. Creatures within 60 feet of Valin, including ones behind barriers and around corners, can't regain hit points until the end of Valin's next turn.

legendary.name: Whirlwind of Sand (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Valin magically transforms into a whirlwind of sand, moves up to 60 feet, and reverts to her normal form. While in whirlwind form, Valin is immune to all damage, and it can't be {@condition grappled}, {@condition petrified}, knocked {@condition prone}, {@condition restrained}, or {@condition stunned}. Equipment worn or carried by Valin remain in her possession.

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: Varnyr té avantatge a salvar contra la condició {@condition charmed} i no pot patir son màgicament

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Varnyr fa dos atacs.

action.name: Cane
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany contundent.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: Varnyr adds 2 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, Varnyr must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The wood elf's és Saviesa ({@dc 12} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The wood elf és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 10. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Intel·ligència ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The wood elf has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: The wood elf has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the wood elf to sleep.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) de dany contundent, o 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) de dany contundent if used with two hands, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Summon Demon (1/Dia)
entries: The wood elf magically summons a quasit, or attempts to summon a shadow demon with a {@chance 50|50 percent} chance of success. The summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 10 minutes, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Zikzokrishka falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Zikzokrishka té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Zikzokrishka can use its Presència Aterradora. It then fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) de dany perforant mes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany elèctric.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Presència Aterradora
entries: Each creature of Zikzokrishka's choice that is within 120 feet of the Zikzokrishka and aware of ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 18} or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. Si la criatura supera la salvació o l'efecte acaba prematurament, la criatura és immune a Zikzokrishka's Presència Aterradora durant les properes 24 hores.

action.name: Alè de Llamp {@recharge 5}
entries: Zikzokrishka exhala lamps en una línia de 90 peus de llarg i 5 d'ample. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 20}. Qui falli rep 66 ({@damage 12d10}) de dany elèctric; si supera, en rep la meitat.

legendary.name: Detectar
entries: Zikzokrishka fa una tirada d'habilitat de Saviesa (Percepció).

legendary.name: Atac de Cua
entries: Zikzokrishka fa un atac Cua.

legendary.name: Atac Ala (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Zikzokrishka beats its tattered wings. Each creature within 10 feet of Zikzokrishka ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 21} or take 14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) de dany contundent and be knocked {@condition prone}. After beating its wings this way, Zikzokrishka can fly up to half its flying speed.
